example.eg: His boss gave him three assignments to be completed by the end of the week.
example.egtrans: 老板给他分派了三个任务，要他在周末前完成。

example.eg: The teacher told his students to hand in their assignments by Friday.
example.egtrans: 老师告诉学生要在周五之前上交作业。

example.eg: The sales manager moved to Chicago after his assignment there by the company.
example.egtrans: 销售经理被公司委派到芝加哥，他就搬去了那里住。

example.eg: The assignment of the diplomat to the Embassy in Paris was approved by senior ministers.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 分配, 选派, 分派

example.eg: The assignment of the property was specified in the contract.
His principal assignment is general maintenance.
example.egtrans: 他的主要职责是常规维修。
